frontmatter.title: Performance of meaning
frontmatter.description: interactive installation assisting users to draw abstract artworks

projectData.task: To create a commissioned interactive artwork for 'Art of the future' Biennal Moscow and reflect on the relationship between reflexivity and contingency by creating a generative algorithm producing pleasing abstract works and exhibit it.
projectData.whyExists: The project uses generative algorithm written in p5.js that defines color palettes, shapes and direction of their movement for each time the program runs. An installation lets visitors create their own artworks like these.

process.title: Coding
process.caption: The curators of MAMM asked me to create an artwork. I developed one algorithm and its three variations

process.title: Testing
process.caption: Tested and calibrated it on different screens

process.title: Exhibition
process.caption: Exhibited the work along such artists like Stanza and Nonotak Studio
